Name: Mitch Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: One of London's contemporary classics. Far from a proper Martini, this is fruity and sweet, but not overly so.
History: Created in 1997 by Giovanni Burdi at Match EC1, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Mitch Martini contains 195 calories
